name: HackQuest
fullText:
📢 Announcing our upcoming AMA!

This is Blockchain, for Good: HackQuest Edition 🎓✨

Part of the BGA x Bybit Students Campaign, we’ll cover:
🎤 The vision behind the campaign
📚 Opportunities for students
📝 How to craft standout submissions

🗓 Aug 23, 22:00 SGT https://t.co/wd71qJln0e
